title: Language Learning Project Strengthening Technical Skills Through Remote Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A weekend-intensive course for working professionals, involving job-linked project execution.

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80%+ task completion rate with native speaker partners using smartphone-based collaboration tools (KakaoTalk, Google Docs, etc.).
Learners express linguistic creativity through three multimedia content (audio/video/image) production projects over four weeks.
Learners incorporate over 70% of improvements during the feedback cycle process using technological tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
